creditline: Lent by DRG, DRG Collection and Darwin and Geri Reedy
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: round face with point on top of head; white pigment predominantly with accents of black and dark red; animal hide nailed to chin with hair attached, hanging down to form 'beard'; metal mounting apparatus attached to underside; grey foam tied to underside
dimension: H.9 x W.7 x D.4 in. (without hair)
medium: wood, animal hide, hair, iron nails, pigment
title: Ngobudi Mask
